chapter.title: README
chapter.para: Usage of the STM library on Linux. In order to use the O_STM library with any C++ application, it need to be placed to the operation system /usr/lib directory. Copy lib_o_stm.so file to /usr/lib: sudo cp lib_o_stm.so /usr/lib Include the TM.h TX.h and the OSTM.h files in your application. Create Makefile : Makefile.mk Documentation

EXE =Test
CC = g++
PROGRAM = app
CFLAGS =-std=c++14 -pthread
CFILES = main.cpp AIB.cpp ULSTER.cpp BOA.cpp UNBL.cpp SWBPLC.cpp
HFILES = TM.h TX.h OSTM.h AIB.h ULSTER.h BOA.h UNBL.h SWBPLC.h
all:
Rule for SHARED linking

:
*.cpp -I -L /usr/lib/lib_o_stm.so -o
clean:
rm -f *.o
Run the application/executable file : ./Test
